metadata.description:
Happy to be back

First song I made for 2023 top to bottom. (1/24-1/26)
Also the first one after fully recovering from my Ear ordeal.
Still have my hearing, but some loss in volume sensitivity. 
(Gotta stop blasting music)

Want to maintain a regular release schedule - Optimally Bi-Weekly,
If not monthly.
Nonetheless, I'm excited to share.

Wondered what it would be like to put some soul, pop & punk together with a lil' 1970s flavor..

It's a bit of a sad song, but against upbeat rhythm & soothing melodies..

It might feel like a love song to you, but tbh I wanted to write from the perspective of Adam, being kicked out the Garden of Eden.

I'm digging this flow of releasing, everything different than the last.., as I build in the traditional sense getting ready to tour. - Every drop on here should serve all the easter eggs I'll ever make.
"Life's a box of chocolates."

Hope you enjoy this

lyrics.text:
My favorite day
Shouldn’t feel like a mistake
By night
At the very least
I’m sad, but I feel peace
Inside, Ins-i-i-i-ide

Oooh hooo
Hooo oooh
I must be in a daydream
Oooh hooo
Hooo oooh
It’s only just a daydream

Tearing at the seems
With songs from which I bleed
In spite, in spite 
And as the pages burn 
These lessons have been learned in life
My li-i-i-ife without you
Oooh hooo
Is nothing like a day dream
Hooo oooh
This isn’t just a day dream

All these glimpses of happiness 
Hardly clear, a mirage
Pioneer of facade
Another faceless identity
All these glimpses of happiness 
Disappear in a thought
Anything can go wrong
There’s an ending to everything
All Is broken inside of me
Can’t get back what you've lost 
I can’t fake the facade
Ought to just claim insanity

metadata.name: Daydream #1
metadata.title: Daydream
